product_name: KORRESGreek Yoghurt Wide Awake Eye Gel
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingGive BackKORRES Greek Yoghurt Wide Awake Eye Gel is a cooling, roll-on eye serum made with nourishing Greek yoghurt and a double shot of caffeine for fatigue-free eyes that reduces dark circles and undereye puffiness.
details: DetailsFeaturesWinner of Best Eye Cream Over $20 in TZR's High/Low Beauty Awards 2022Key IngredientsGreek Yoghurt: Protein + Probiotic rich yoghurt hydrates the skin and balances microbiomeHyaluronic Acid: Triple-complex with a superpower of hydration and antiaging benefitsCaffeine: Wakes up tired eyesNatural peptides: Fights puffiness and dark circlesResearch Results94% said their skin looked instantly fresh and revitalized94% saw reduced appearance of dark circles with 14 days of use91% saw visibly less puffy eye bags in 7 days of useItem 2609196How To UseAfter cleansing and moisturizing, roll around the eye area.Pro-tip: Keep your Greek Yoghurt Wide Awake Eye Gel in the fridge for an extra awakening burst of coolness.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Propanediol, Glycerin,Pentylene Glycol, Algin, Alpha-Glucanoligosaccharide, Ammoniumacryloyldimethyltaurate/Vp Copolymer,Ascorbic Acid, Barium Sulfate , Bisabolol,Butylene Glycol, Caffeine, Camellia Sinensis Leafextract, Caprylyl Glycol, Cellulose, Chamomillarecutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract,Chenopodium Quinoa Seed Extract, Chlorellavulgaris Extract, Citric Acid, Coffea Arabica(Coffee) Seed Extract, Coffea Robusta Seedextract, Crataegus Monogyna Flower Extract,Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract,Disodium Phosphate, Ethylhexylglycerin,Glyceryl Acrylate/Acrylic Acid Copolymer,Glyceryl Polyacrylate, Helianthus Annuus(Sunflower) Seed Oil, Hydrolyzed Sodiumhyaluronate, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Jasminumsambac (Jasmine) Flower Extract, Jojoba Esters,Lactic Acid, Lactobacillus, Lactobacillus/Arundinariagigantea Ferment Filtrate, Laminariadigitata Extract, Lecithin, Leuconostoc/Radishroot Ferment Filtrate, Lonicera Caprifolium(Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Lonicerajaponica (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract,Maltodextrin, Maris Aqua/Sea Water/Eau De Mer,Mica, Phenethyl Alcohol, Polyglyceryl-3diisostearate, Polymnia Sonchifolia Root Juice,Potassium Phosphate, Pullulan, Saccharideisomerate, Salvia Hispanica Seed Oil, Serine, Silica,Sodium Carboxymethyl Beta-Glucan, Sodiumhyaluronate, Sodium Polyacrylate, Tetrasodiumglutamate Diacetate, Titanium Dioxide,Tocopherol, Trehalose, Urea, Yogurt, Yogurtpowder, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Rootextract, Benzyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol,Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: After cleansing and moisturizing, roll around the eye area.Pro-tip: Keep your Greek Yoghurt Wide Awake Eye Gel in the fridge for an extra awakening burst of coolness.

reviews.headline: Visibly reduces puffiness
reviews.comments: I don't know why this only has a 4.1 rating. I've cycled through a lot of eye creams, serums, you name it and this one actually delivers. I guess maybe it depends what you want from it. I wouldn't say it's really brightening but I don't think that that is the purpose of this. ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

reviews.headline: Awesome!
reviews.comments: Love this! Feels good under eyes. Coming back to order more.

reviews.headline: A staple/ favorite
reviews.comments: I've been using this eye gel for 5 months. I'm 26 and have found creams to be to heavy on my under eyes. + Ive suffered with dark circles my whole life. This gel product helps brighten and soothez.

reviews.headline: Must try!
reviews.comments: I have been using this product for almost four months and I am so glad that I gave this eye gel a try. It takes away the morning puffiness and my my under eye area looks brighter. I use this in the morning and at night. This has become a staple in my face care routine.

reviews.headline: I Must Be Missing Something
reviews.comments: This product done nothing for me. I have dark circles and after reading the reviews I was hoping this would be a miracle worker but I can't tell the difference in this and applying water under my eyes

reviews.headline: I Must Be Missing Something
reviews.comments: This product done nothing for me. I have dark circles and after reading the reviews I was hoping this would be a miracle worker but I can't tell the difference in this and applying water under my eyes

reviews.headline: Cooling effect
reviews.comments: Ive been using this for about a month now and applying it in th AM only. It definitely gives off a cooling effect, depuffs, and visibily makes my eyes look more awake. Its more of serum and less of a gel consistency but is pretty moisterizing nonetheless. I sometimes I like to pair it with a eye cream for added moisture.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: My eyelids are very puffy in the mornings, and this is the only product I've found that visibly reduces the puffiness. It gives just enough moisture to the area as well. The only con is the packaging; like with other reviewers, my eye gel fell on the floor and shattered after only a few weeks of use.

reviews.headline: Good cream, poor packaging
reviews.comments: I was only able to use the cream a few times before it rolled off my counter and cracked (the container is a fragile glass).  It was not stable on its side nor upright.  I liked the cream, but won't repurchase since it was a waste.

reviews.headline: Terrible Packaging!
reviews.comments: I wish the previous review existed before I ordered this because I probably would not have bought this product. It works really well, made my eyes look fresh and awake with just the right amount of moisturizing. BUT, It rolled off my shelf and it shattered everywhere! My reaction was verbatim what the last reviewer wrote. Why on earth would they make this out of glass?! I was so mad because it was pretty much brand new. Not only am I out an eye cream, but I am out money from the one that broke and had to buy another one (which I bubble wrapped just in case), which is even more money out. I'm still finding little pieces of glass on the floor. Overall, very disappointing.

reviews.headline: Poor packaging
reviews.comments: I really love this eye gel and I was using it religiously every morning to make myself look more awake.  My only complaint is the packaging.  I dropped it on the floor and it shattered.  That wasnt aomething I was expecting.  Why wouldn't they use plastic?  I didn't think the glass to be so thin and break as easily as it did.

reviews.headline: I'm impressed!
reviews.comments:
I've had it for just a few days but, so far, so good!
Goes on smoothly and does not cake up over eye cream or serum.

reviews.headline: Good Product
reviews.comments:
This product does seem to reduce bags and darkness under eyes. 
It is oily based and it doesn't irrated my eyes. I have used this a few times and it does seem to help.

reviews.headline: Improvement within a few days
reviews.comments:
Love this product! Ive tried so many different products for dark circles and this is the only product that has worked for me! 

Definitely worth the buy!

reviews.headline: it does something
reviews.comments: I honestly feel like it reduced my baggage , I've only used it twice so far so good

reviews.headline: Honestly A Decent Product!!!
reviews.comments:
Ive been searching for an eye cream for quite a while
now and always hesitated bc theyre all so expensive. I have only tried one (from the body shop) and was not satisfied with it. I have heard a lot of good things about Korres so I just gave in and splurged and decided to buy this rollerball eye cream.
I honestly love it. The application is easy and smooth, I have not had any issues with it at all, even when applying it over my serum. In fact it glides on even better then. I have been using it for about 2-3 weeks now and my under eyes are not clear of course, but I have noticed a vast difference from when I began using this. 
My under eyes are a lot less dark, however some mild darkness is still present. My under eyes also stay super hydrated for a long time and when applying makeup, I no longer have a cakey under eye. 
I would definiltey give this one a go (:

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: Love this for my allergies are acting up and i have dark circles and puffines the rolloer ball instantly de puffs and helps calm and soothe. I put this on first then layer it with a cream. You can never go wrong with Korres.

reviews.headline: Best eye serum I've tried.
reviews.comments: I've tried several rollerball/cold spoon eye serums, and this has by far been the fastest acting, and most potent. Some caffeinated serums that I've tried in the past have dries out my eyes, but the Korres serum keeps my eyes hydrated, whether I pair it with a separate eye cream or not.

reviews.headline: Helps depuff without irritation
reviews.comments: My eczema flares up easily around my eyes so I have to be super careful about products and ingredients. I wanted something to use first thing in the morning for puffy eyes and chose this because it didn't have a lot of active ingredients. I basically only wanted something with caffiene and a metal applicator. It has so far (a couple of weeks) not triggered any irritation at all, and it makes my eyes feel less puffy quickly. It is not very moisturizing but that is OK since I have other eye creams for that purpose.
reviews.nickname: they made me enter something here

reviews.headline: LOVE this!!!!!
reviews.comments: Love this product! It has a wonderful cooling effect when you roll it under the eyes. I've been using for a few weeks and no more purple under the eyes! This will be a forever product for me!

rollup.name: Greek Yoghurt Wide Awake Eye Gel
